bibl.title: Poems in Context. Greek Poetry in the Egyptian Thebaid 200-600 AD. (Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts. 2.)
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. Salamanca, 2006. - 1. The so-called school of Nonnus in the literary context of Panopolis (3rd-6th c. AD). - 2. Common stylistic features. - 3. The role of culture and education in Panopolis (3rd-6th c. AD). - 4. Influence of school-practice on poetry: The progymnasmata. - 5. Conclusions. - Bibliography. General index. Index locorum.
